message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $16,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but the product is worth considerably more than that to me. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand the value you place on the product, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. My counteroffer remains at $10,000.
